title: ayyan azhagan
sahitya:
ayyan azhagan shOlai malaikkarashan avanpAl maiyal mighak-koNDEnaDi


anupallavi

  taiyalAr mUvaruNDu daraNiyOr arindapaDi tamiyEnukkum iDam tandiDa vENDumaDi


caraNam    kazhal ninaindAl angam azhalAik-kodikkudaDi karayugaLam ennaik-kAntam pOl izhukkudaDi
 muruval mukham ninaindAl mOham mIrudaDi arubadu nAzhigaiyum avan ninaivE ninaivu
 narumalar vaittumE kAttirukkinrEn nangai nI shenru nAthanai kaNDu
 oru murai vandAl en uyir tarikkum enru uravu murai sholli uDan azhaittu vADi
